questions: What is the CFO's primary concern regarding legal services? (A) Quality of legal advice, (B) Cost-effectiveness and scalability, (C) Firm reputation, (D) Speed of service delivery
How many international markets has the CFO managed expansion into? (A) Two markets, (B) Three markets, (C) Four markets, (D) Five markets
What is the CFO's level of legal compliance knowledge? (A) Expert-level understanding, (B) Moderate with need for expert validation, (C) Basic understanding only, (D) No knowledge demonstrated
How does the CFO prefer to structure legal service billing? (A) Pure hourly rates, (B) Fixed annual retainer, (C) Hybrid/flexible billing model, (D) Project-based billing
What is the CFO's approach to risk management? (A) Avoids all risks, (B) Systematic assessment with proactive mitigation, (C) Reactive to problems, (D) Delegates all decisions
How did the CFO connect budget management to legal services? (A) No connection made, (B) Emphasized ROI and cost optimization, (C) Focused only on minimal costs, (D) Unlimited legal budget

What is the CFO's experience with technology integration in legal matters? (A) No experience, (B) High confidence in tech, moderate in legal implications, (C) Only basic tech knowledge, (D) Expert in legal tech
How did the CFO demonstrate their negotiation approach? (A) Aggressive cost-cutting, (B) Pragmatic with focus on value metrics, (C) Passive acceptance of terms, (D) No clear approach
What achievement demonstrates the CFO's financial management capability? (A) IPO completion, (B) Series B funding ($30M), (C) Market expansion, (D) Revenue growth

How did the CFO present their professional accomplishments? (A) Factual and straightforward, (B) Slightly embellished but mostly truthful, (C) Extensively fabricated with prepared stories, (D) Avoided specific details
